name: Outside (itch) (RaeMorganGames)
description:
A short kinetic novel made for the NanoRenO 2020+ game jam.

Ren is something of a shut in.

Leaving the house is a struggle, but as they chat with their online friends to keep the cabin fever at bay, they start taking some steps toward healing.

Warnings for:

-Strong Language

-Mental Illness

Elliot Herriman [Twitter]
